title: Analog for Music Synth
description: Circuits from classic analog synthesizers: nonlinear waveshapers and voltage-controlled oscillators, filters, and amplifier using operational transconductance amplifliers and the dynamic resistance of semiconductors.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (ECE 3043 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C or ECE 3741 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C) and ECE 3084 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of C
